CHAT.comment: Chi resists reading the book aloud but Mot strongly suggests that she read it again. Chi reads the book , and Mot then encourages her to begin the letter. Chi begins the letter and tells Mot that she has to give her some ideas as well. Throughout this activity , Chi comes up with ideas , and Mot helps her rephrase the sentences. Mot also spells several words for Chi. Chi's brother is present during the activity , and tries to help out once in a while.

u.a: BRO handed Chi the wrong glasses
opens the book and flips to the first page
Chi speeds through reading the list of food
bef Chi writes the letter silently
draws the word out a bit
MOT and Bro talk quietly about the family cat which is crying very loudly
